Arpit Gupta

Who I am

Hi, I’m Arpit Gupta, a Full Stack Developer (MERN) and Android App Developer. At Piedocx Technologies, I build scalable web apps, from AI-powered chat systems to dynamic dashboards. I also integrate real-time communication, OCR, automation, and computer vision to create next-gen solutions..

I see myself as a creator who turns ideas into impactful digital products. Alongside my professional work, I pursue freelance projects and personal innovations. Beyond coding, I enjoy writing and exploring emerging fields like Machine Learning and AI. For me, growth comes from curiosity, experimentation, and creating meaningful value through technology.
